ai-patthana14.5:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.5:1.1_0: (They are) not connected with the cause and reasons. (Thesecurely) associated with cause and reasons.
ai-patthana14.5:1.1_1: (They are) not connected with the cause and reasons. (These causes and reasons to be associated with cause and reasons. Yet they don’t give rise to the cause or reason for the reason for the sake of this.
ai-patthana14.5:1.1_2: (They are) not connected with the cause, nor causes and reasons to be connected with the reason for the sake of these things.”
ai-patthana14.5:2.1_0: (They are) not associated with cause or reasons. Please, for the sake of purification, and for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.5:2.1_1: (They are) not associated with roots, and not with the cause or reasons.
ai-patthana14.5:2.1_2: (They are) not associated with roots, and not with the cause or reasons. (They don’t arise because of cause or reasons.
ai-patthana14.5:3.1_0: (They are) associated with the cause and reasoned. Yet with the cause or reason for the sake of these things, they don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana14.5:3.1_1: (They are) associated with cause and reasoned to give rise to the cause, and those without cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.5:3.1_2: (They are) associated with cause and reasoned to give up causes and conditions for the sake of the reasons. Though there is no cause or reason for the sake of these things, they don’t arise because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.5:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.5:4.1_0: Yet you can ask a newly arrived monks for nine months.
